name: Worldbreaker
description: In the end, the moon will smother the sun. And in that hopeless dawn, four titans will rise to shatter the world itself.

skinlines.name: Worldbreaker
skinlines.description: The Prophecy of the First Destruction warned of four titans hellbent on devastation, a tale that would surely come to pass. And in its wake, the Worldweaver grew from ashen soil and built the broken earth anew. Only the wisest of seers see the story yet to come, a second coming and a last hope.
